attributes.action: ban Jeremy kyle show until after watershed
attributes.additional_details: The Jeremy Kyle show is a programe that shows violence and causes distress to vulnerable people and children so why is it alowed on before the watershed,  Please remove Jeremy Kyle from daytime TV and put it on after 9pm and stop children seeing violence and aggression as a form of entertainment.

rejection.details: Responsibility for what is broadcast on television and radio rests with the broadcasters and the organisations which regulate broadcasting - the Office of Communications (OFCOM), the BBC Trust and the Welsh Fourth Channel Authority (S4C). They are independent of the Government.
